package.name: Quart
package.shortDescription: Redesign of notifications and music player.

descriptionlist.description: Quart will bring a new design to your lock screen. Notification Banners are now rounded and more compact. New compact, rounded design for Media Player on the lock screen. Drag down to clear all notifications at once. A huge number of customization settings for banners and icons. Quart is optimized to work with Grupi, Noctis Neo and NextUp 2..
